node.label.description: The menu label of the page.

node.pageId.description: ID of the page if within HubSpot.

node.contentGroupId.description: Blog ID of the page if it is a HubSpot blog post.

node.parentNode.description: The parent node of the current node. The parent node will have the current node in its children property.

node.children.description: The list of child nodes for the current node.

node.activeBranch.description: True if the node is in the top-level branch that the current page is in.

node.activeNode.description: True if the node is the current page.

node.level.description: The number of levels deep the current node is from the top-level nodes.

node.pageTitle.description: Name of the content page if within HubSpot.
